room_title: Escape room "Killer Feature" by Epic Escape Rooms LI in New York
review: Just tried it today and it was really fun. The owners were awesome. I could really tell they had fun putting everything together. My girlfriend and I tried the Killer Instinct room and it was really challenging. We barely came out alive and it left us mentally drained. If you’re looking for a challenging one then I definitely recommend this one. I can’t wait to go back and try the other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Killer Feature" by Epic Escape Rooms LI in New York
review: Challenging but in a good way! Loved the concept! The owner and staff were so nice. We definitely want to come back to their other rooms. We've done a few escape rooms before and this is one of the best ones.

room_title: Escape room "Killer Feature" by Epic Escape Rooms LI in New York
review: Great room! Came here last Friday to do the Killer Feature room. It was definitely hard but we escaped! Kat was really helpful when it came to booking the trip and the staff was very friendly. I'll definitely be back to do their other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Killer Feature" by Epic Escape Rooms LI in New York
review: This was our 17th escape room. Killer Feature was well thought out and challenging. We had an amazing time, and we will be going back for the other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Killer Feature" by Epic Escape Rooms LI in New York
review: The Killer Feature has enough twist and turns for even the most seasoned escape room thrill seekers. Great puzzles and good clues and an overall fun time! Great high energy, friendly and engaging staff. This place ranks up there with the best escape rooms on LI! My team and I will be back.
